ud4.4:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati veluvane kalandakanivape.
ud4.4:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma ca sariputto ayasma ca mahamoggallano kapotakandarayam viharanti.
ud4.4:1.4: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma sariputto junhaya rattiya navoropitehi kesehi abbhokase nisinno hoti annataram samadhim samapajjitva.
ud4.4:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena dve yakkha sahayaka uttaraya disaya dakkhinam disam gacchanti kenacideva karaniyena.
ud4.4:2.2: Addasamsu kho te yakkha ayasmantam sariputtam junhaya rattiya navoropitehi kesehi abbhokase nisinnam.
ud4.4:2.3: Disvana eko yakkho dutiyam yakkham etadavoca:
ud4.4:2.4: “patibhati mam, samma, imassa samanassa sise paharam datun”ti.
ud4.4:2.5: Evam vutte, so yakkho tam yakkham etadavoca:
ud4.4:2.7: Ularo so, samma, samano mahiddhiko mahanubhavo”ti.
ud4.4:3.1: Dutiyampi kho so yakkho tam yakkham etadavoca:
ud4.4:3.2: “patibhati mam, samma, imassa samanassa sise paharam datun”ti.
ud4.4:3.3: Dutiyampi kho so yakkho tam yakkham etadavoca:
ud4.4:3.5: Ularo so, samma, samano mahiddhiko mahanubhavo”ti.
ud4.4:3.6: Tatiyampi kho so yakkho tam yakkham etadavoca:
ud4.4:3.7: “patibhati mam, samma, imassa samanassa sise paharam datun”ti.
ud4.4:3.8: Tatiyampi kho so yakkho tam yakkham etadavoca:
ud4.4:3.10: Ularo so, samma, samano mahiddhiko mahanubhavo”ti.
ud4.4:4.1: Atha kho so yakkho tam yakkham anadiyitva ayasmato sariputtattherassa sise paharam adasi.
ud4.4:4.2: Tava maha paharo ahosi, api tena paharena sattaratanam va addhatthamaratanam va nagam osadeyya, mahantam va pabbatakutam padaleyya.
ud4.4:4.3: Atha ca pana so yakkho “dayhami dayhami”ti vatva tattheva mahanirayam apatasi.
ud4.4:5.1: Addasa kho ayasma mahamoggallano dibbena cakkhuna visuddhena atikkantamanusakena tena yakkhena ayasmato sariputtattherassa sise paharam diyamanam.
ud4.4:5.2: Disva yena ayasma sariputto tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam sariputtam etadavoca:
ud4.4:5.3: “kacci te, avuso, khamaniyam, kacci yapaniyam, kacci na kinci dukkhan”ti?
ud4.4:5.4: “Khamaniyam me, avuso moggallana, yapaniyam me, avuso moggallana;
ud4.4:5.5: api ca me sisam thokam dukkhan”ti.
ud4.4:6.3: Idha te, avuso sariputta, annataro yakkho sise paharam adasi.
ud4.4:6.4: Tava maha paharo ahosi, api tena paharena sattaratanam va addhatthamaratanam va nagam osadeyya, mahantam va pabbatakutam padaleyya, atha ca panayasma sariputto evamaha:
ud4.4:6.5: ‘khamaniyam me, avuso moggallana, yapaniyam me, avuso moggallana;
ud4.4:6.6: api ca me sisam thokam dukkhan’”ti.
ud4.4:7.2: Yava mahiddhiko ayasma mahamoggallano mahanubhavo yatra hi nama yakkhampi passissati.
ud4.4:8.1: Assosi kho bhagava dibbaya sotadhatuya visuddhaya atikkantamanusikaya tesam ubhinnam mahanaganam imam evarupam kathasallapam.
ud4.4:9.1: Atha kho bhagava etamattham viditva tayam velayam imam udanam udanesi:
